title: Breaking International News & Views
text:
At least 15 people were killed in an attack on a Shi'ite Muslim shrine in the Iranian city of Shiraz on Wednesday, state news agency IRNA said, as security forces elsewhere opened fire on protesters marking 40 days since the death of Mahsa Amini.

undefined ago
